function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Poor indoor air quality due to contaminants from outdoor and indoor sources","Impact":"Acute health effects such as asthma, throat irritation, and heart disease, as well as chronic health effects like cancer and bronchitis","Mitigation":"Improving ventilation systems and reducing indoor pollutants","Technologies":"Advanced HVAC systems and air filtration systems","People":"Occupants of buildings","Owner":"Building owners and facility managers"},{"Description":"Elevated negative emotions, aggressive behaviors, and mental fatigue due to indoor air contaminants","Impact":"Decreased well-being and productivity of occupants","Mitigation":"Improving indoor air quality and reducing the concentration of contaminants","Technologies":"Psychological interventions and improved ventilation systems","People":"Occupants of buildings","Owner":"Building owners and facility managers"},{"Description":"Dependency between ventilation rates and respiratory symptoms in single-family houses and sick building syndromes in offices","Impact":"Increased risk of respiratory symptoms and sick building syndromes with lower ventilation rates","Mitigation":"Increasing ventilation rates and implementing ventilation monitoring systems","Technologies":"Energy recovery ventilation systems and occupancy sensors","People":"Occupants of single-family houses and office workers","Owner":"Building owners and facility managers"}]}
